location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a copy of a letter, dated 24 September 1814, from William Bruce to Lieutenant Joseph Phillips, Commander of the Vestalcruiser. Bruce informs Warden that Captain Wyatt, Captain McDonald and Captain Swanstone are proceeding to the Presidency on board the Vestal.Enclosure follows on from the letter.
